title: Giuntoli: 'Napoli can't afford Icardi'

content:
Napoli sporting director Cristiano Giuntoli has revealed that Inter loanee Mauro Icardi is ‘far beyond our financial reach’.
In an extensive interview with Sky Sport 24, the Azzurri director spoke about the economical ‘setback’ in football during the current… [+2265 chars]
